description:
Ataru picks up a blowfish to use in a stew, but it quickly escapes onto school grounds after Ten feeds it a piece of space candy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les deux meilleurs amis du monde
Panic Among Friends! I Love to Eat Blowfish
Yuujou Panikku! Wai wa Fugu wa Suki ya nen
友情パニック! わいはフグが好きやねん
